name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s andGate.vcl -t Agda -o andGate.agda -c proofcache.vclp --network andGate:NO_FILE

name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s andGate.vcl -t Marabou -o andGate.inputquery/ --network andGate:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s andGate.vcl -t LossFunction -o andGate.loss.json --network andGate:NO_FILE
